body.name: RisoPhy Wireless Gaming Mouse,Tri-Mode 2.4G/USB-C/Bluetooth Mouse Up to 10000DPI,Chroma RGB Backlit,Ergonomic Mouse with 8 Programmable Buttons,Rechargeable Computer Mouse for Laptop,PC,Mac
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: ⚡️【Latest Three Modes Connectivity】This wireless gaming mouse supports 3 modes of connection to meet a variety of user scenarios. Switch to 2.4G mode and Bluetooth mode when playing games,saving you the hassle of cable,and getting longer battery life.If it is not enough, you can also switch to traditional wired mode with the included rechargeable USB-C cable.Up to 3 devices can be connected simultaneously, such gaming mice are perfect for multi-device productivity.

⚡️【Immersive RGB Backlight】True RGB effect,16.8 million colors for choice.This RGB gaming mouse has 7 kinds of RGB lighting effects such as streamer, horse racing, neon, solid color, etc to match your game style and desktop layout.All the light effect parameters can be customized with the attached software,giving you the best lighting experience.Light can be also turned off if you don't want it with the convenient switch under this computer mouse.

⚡️【Pixel-Level Tracking Accuracy】The gaming mouse has a 6-level DPI (1200-2400-3500-5000-7000-10000DPI) and 20G acceleration. This gaming mouse offers pixel-level accuracy for high-intensity gaming and daily office use. There are also 4 polling rates (125-250-500-1000HZ) to reduce lag and ensure smooth motion.

⚡️【8 Programmable Buttons & Quick Fire Button】RisoPhy wireless mouse support macro editing, and all the buttons can be programmed with the easy-to-use software.The advantage is that the fire button（✈𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤 = 𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐬） is on the left side of your index finger which is very easy to click, giving you the edge you need during those intense FPS battles.It is also great for MOBA/RTS games. NOTE:Programming software is only available on Windows and only supports wired mode.

⚡️【Extreme Ergonomics & Professional After-Sales Service】This bluetooth gaming mouse is designed for medium-large hands, and if you have larger hands, you'll be amazed at how well-supported this gamer mouse is. Ring finger, pinky and thumb rest provide you with maximum comfort, matte texture is sweat-proof and non-slip, the first choice for computer gamers.

Great for Gaming Extremely comfortable and precise experience for PC gaming and Mac gaming. This wireless mouse work well with Windows 7/8/10/ Vista, Mac,etc. Quick Fire Button The fire button（𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤 = 𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐬） is on the left side of your index finger, giving you the edge during those battles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mouse
reviews.reviewText: I usually get Razer gaming mice but decided to try a different one after my Naga died.This mouse is comfortable and has a nice weight to it.I have an old finger injury so it’s hard for me to find one that doesn’t irritate my finger after a hours of use, but, I can use this mouse for hours and my hand doesn’t tire and it doesn’t irritate my injured finger.Mouse has a convenient switch for Bluetooth or using the dongle. I use Bluetooth and it connected right away to my gaming/work laptop. The only con here is that one of the buttons is designed/unable to operate on Bluetooth.Mouse charges quickly as well with a provided USB-A to USB-C cable.Overall a great mouse for a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very comfortable and suitible for work and casual gaming
reviews.reviewText: ive had this mouse for a month now, and its very good! i like the smooth feeling it has and how it feels in my hand(i have small hands). im able to customize the side buttons to copy and paste which is so convenient for my WFH job because i do it so much. fully customizable RGB solid colors as well as customizable dpi options. i had an issue with getting the driver installed, but i contacted support and the seller sent me a direct link for the download and it worked! clicking sound is on the louder side but if you have noise canceling of any sort it shouldnt pick up on mics. when i got the mouse i used the batteries for my old mouse and a 40% battery(shows on the driver) lasted me until yesterday, which it was at 20% when it begun to blink red to indicate the battery was dying. just turn off the mouse when not using it. has macro but im too lazy to figure it out and i dont need it. this was the only wireless mouse i could find that has RGB and takes batteries instead of being rechargable while being at an affordable price. can safely say i reccomend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functionally, an excellent mouse... battery life is lousy, though
reviews.reviewText: Sadly, after later use, I am not thrilled with battery life... on a full, overnight charge, it provides just a few hours of battery life before it starts flashing Red, and an hour after that (of gaming) and it is dead. Fortunately, I can run a USB cable to it, in a way that doesn't interfere with use, but basically that gives me a wired mouse. Maybe that is why T-Dagger's actual mouse is simply wired.Also, it needs quite a few hours (basically overnight) to get back to full charge.So generally, this is an excellent mouse to use, but it really is a wired mouse, most of the time.So I'm dropping my review to 4 starts.Original review:I'm using Windows 10 Pro, and was looking for several key characteristics:1. large mouse (preferably about 5" long) for my large hands2. long battery life between charges, and internal battery if possible3. comfortable, curved, ergonomic design4. works reliably in games, on my new large mouse pad (only one mouse has failed that test).This mouse fits all the requirements, and is a joy to use!! I don't yet know how battery life is going to play out, but otherwise it is just perfect. And I love the flowing color scheme, though usually I don't really care about LED patterns on my computer equipment.An interesting note about this device, is that it claims to be made by RysoPhy, that T symbol is actually the symbol for a peripheral company named T-Dagger... and when I look on the T-Dagger sight, I see a mouse that is identical to this, except that it is wired only... apparently the wifi/bluetooth design was customized for RysoPhy... doesn't matter to me, except that I've used T-Dagger mice before and they've always been reliable, so that is reassuring...This one is definitely a keeper!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse for the price
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouse to use with my laptop for work and online classes. I am picky about mice, but I'm also cheap. I game with a Redragon wired MMO mouse on my desktop PC and the mouse is super comfortable and I liked the finger rests. I wanted a wireless version but I'm cheap and broke so I found this mouse here and it's been pretty good. Very comfortable, adjustable dpi which is nice, and has decent response. I haven't tried playing anything like a FPS with it yet, but it was responsive enough for Diablo Immortal. Battery life if really good. Being rechargeable is also nice so I'm not wasting money on batteries.Summary:*It's comfy*Decent response*Rechargeable*Inexpensive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a dope mouse, buy it you won't regret it. It lasts a long time without needing a charge and if it does just plug it in and use away! Goes perfectly with my laptop too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works BT, with USB dongle or USB-C cable
reviews.reviewText: Service is top notch, the right click stopped clicking, I messaged the seller and they replaced it right away. Support is GTEAT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable mouse I've ever used. I used this wired while gaming, but wirelessly for casual use or while editing. Download the program to modify your settings! You're able to select specific DPI levels from a pretty good range and change the lightning effects of the rgb effect. I highly recommend this if you have bigger hands, which is why I love this. Mice are usually small and feel like I'm holding an old flip phone, but I love the bulkiness of this mouse. Side buttons work flawlessly, and after a few months I've yet to have any fading. I've also used this to connect to my smart tv, and it makes web browsing on it a whole lot smoother. Don't even hesitate to get this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cheapest best mouse out there!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing price. Amazing quality. Amazing functions.This mouse rivals my logitech gaming mouse. No joke. M1 and M2 have a smoother sandpaper feel to it, which helps with sweat and grease. The side buttons and thumb button also work great. You can find a software for this mouse online and adjust its DPI and such. There is no room in the mouse to store the receiver, which is a minor issue, but for $11 I cannot complain. The RGB activates when idle, and there are different lighting modes. When in use, it deactivates. In summary, if you need a cheap gaming mouse, BUY THIS!5/5. No regrets at all.

I bought this mouse as secondary to my primary $100 mouse but after using this mouse my $100 mouse is sitting in the drawer. Yes, this is by far the best wireless mouse I have used because it fits perfectly in my hand. My hands are mid-sized, so, the majority of mouses are either too short or too big in my hand. This one fits perfectly. The only con is the Bluetooth range, on the table it is good but the moment I put it away, I can see the lag. It solves my purpose as I always use mouse next to my pc and laptop but might be an issue for those who wants to use mouse at a distance.

L'ho acquistato in sostituzione di un altro analogo mouse , di altra marca, che all'improvviso, dopo solo un anno, ha smesso di funzionare. Attenderò quindi un pò di tempo prima di dare un giudizio definitivo.
Superbe souris , reconnaissance bluethooth sans problème , réglage de la sensibilité facile , bonne autonomie , elle a l'air solide et les couleurs Rgb sont pas mal , je recommande cette souris ...

Ich bin begeistert von der RisoPhy Gaming Maus mit kabelloser RGB-Beleuchtung und vielen Funktionen. Diese Maus hat nicht nur ein beeindruckendes Design, sondern auch leistungsstarke Eigenschaften, die das Spielerlebnis auf die nächste Stufe heben.Die drei verschiedenen Konnektivitätsmodi (2,4-G-Modus, Bluetooth-Modus und USB-C) machen diese Maus äußerst vielseitig und ermöglichen eine bequeme Verbindung mit verschiedenen Geräten. Der 2,4-G-Modus eignet sich besonders gut für Spiele, während der Bluetooth-Modus die Kabel reduziert und die Akkulaufzeit verlängert. Die Möglichkeit, drei Geräte gleichzeitig anzuschließen, ist besonders praktisch für diejenigen, die mehrere Geräte verwenden.Die RGB-Hintergrundbeleuchtung ist atemberaubend und bietet eine Vielzahl von Farboptionen und Effekten. Die Anpassungsmöglichkeiten über die mitgelieferte Software ermöglichen es, die Beleuchtung genau nach den eigenen Vorlieben anzupassen. Die Option, die Beleuchtung mit einem Schalter unter der Maus auszuschalten, ist ebenfalls ein nettes Feature für Zeiten, in denen man die Beleuchtung nicht benötigt.Die Verfolgungsgenauigkeit auf Pixelebene mit 6-stufiger DPI und 20-G-Beschleunigung sorgt für ein präzises und reaktionsschnelles Spielerlebnis. Die Möglichkeit, die DPI je nach Bedarf anzupassen, macht diese Maus auch für den Büroeinsatz geeignet.Die 8 programmierbaren Tasten und die schnelle Feuertaste bieten zusätzliche Flexibilität und Anpassungsmöglichkeiten für verschiedene Spiele. Die ergonomische Gestaltung der Maus ist besonders angenehm, vor allem für mittelgroße Hände. Die matte Textur ist schweißfest und rutschfest, was den Komfort während langer Gaming-Sessions erhöht.Die 100% Geld-zurück-Garantie und die 3-jährige Garantie zeigen das Vertrauen des Herstellers in die Qualität der Maus. Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit der RisoPhy Gaming Maus und empfehle sie jedem, der auf der Suche nach einer hochwertigen, funktionsreichen und stylischen Gaming-Maus ist
